titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the attendance of the members in both houses in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Given at His Majesties Palace of VVhitehall, the twelfth day of December, in the seventeenth yeer of his Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
